did.unittitle: Groat Seminars (Judge William B. Groat) Audio-Visual Materials, 1977- 1978
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Audio recordings of the GROAT ceremonies from 1977 and 1978

bioghist.p: Judge William B. Groat (1899-1986) served as counsel to the New York State Joint Legislative Committee on Industrial and Labor Relations, where he played a pivotal role in founding the ILR School and drafting its charter.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
